channel.title: Timer?
channel.description:
How do you make a player wait for something?
Eg. Player uses seed with patch. Player waits 30secs Player receives herbs
My example should of explained it well, in some words how do you make a delay?
Basically what i want is a timer tut? someone just thoroughly explain to me, that would be awesome
--- Thanks ---

item.title: Timer?
item.dc:creator: @Proview Proview
item.description:
@Proview wrote:

No that DIDN’T help because you don’t know what your on about?

If you don’t understand, please don’t post. that was a rubbish attempt to help me.

I need a void or something so i can make :-

Catches 1 fish
Fishes for 5 seconds
Catches 1 fish
Fishes for 5 seconds

etc. etc. etc.

The fishes for 5 seconds is where it would be the delay, that was another example aswell as the farming one.

Anyone who knows what i mean help me??[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 14, 2008, 09:15:28 AM[/size][hr]Wtf, you deleted your post…lol

Now i need it again…hmmm.

Read full topic
